flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
The fin on MUDKIPs head acts as highly
sensitive radar. Using this fin to sense
movements of water and air, this POKMON can determine what is taking
place around it without using its eyes.

In water, MUDKIP breathes using the
gills on its cheeks.
If it is faced with a tight situation in battle, this POKMON will unleash its
amazing power - it can crush rocks
bigger than itself.

On land, it can powerfully lift large
boulders by planting its four feet and
heaving. It sleeps by burying itself in soil
at the waters edge.

Its large tail fin propels it through
water with powerful acceleration. It is
strong in spite of its size.

Its large tail fin propels it through
water with powerful acceleration. It is
strong in spite of its size.

To alert it, the fin on its head
senses the flow of water. It has
the strength to heft boulders.

To alert it, the fin on its head
senses the flow of water. It has
the strength to heft boulders.

To alert it, the fin on its head
senses the flow of water. It has
the strength to heft boulders.

Its power can crush boulders.
It rests by covering itself with mud
at the bottom of a river.

Its power can crush boulders.
It rests by covering itself with mud
at the bottom of a river.

nageoire sur sa tte. Il est assez
fort pour soulever des rochers.

Sa grande queue en forme de nageoire lui donne
une puissance dacclration incroyable. Il est trs
costaud malgr sa taille.

Durch den propellerartigen Einsatz seiner groen
Schwanzflosse schwimmt es schnell durchs Wasser.
Trotz seiner kleinen Gre ist es stark.

Tiene una larga cola que le propulsa por el agua con
mucha potencia. A pesar de ser pequeo, tiene mucha
fuerza.

La grande pinna sulla coda gli conferisce una
straordinaria accelerazione in acqua.  minuto,
ma forte.

Its large tail fin propels it through water with
powerful acceleration. It is strong in spite of
its size.

Il analyse le courant grce  la nageoire sur sa tte.
Il est assez fort pour soulever des rochers.

Die Flosse auf seinem Kopf prft die Strmung des
Wassers. Dieses Pokmon kann Felsen heben.

La aleta de su cabeza detecta las corrientes de agua
y los peligros. Tiene fuerza para levantar rocas.

Con la pinna sulla testa percepisce i movimenti
dellacqua e sta in guardia. Riesce a sollevare rocce.

To alert it, the fin on its head senses the flow of
water. It has the strength to heft boulders.

La nageoire sur la tte de Gobou lui sert de radar
hypersensible. Il lutilise pour sentir les mouvements
de leau et de lair. Ainsi, ce Pokmon peut savoir ce qui
se passe autour de lui sans avoir  se servir de ses yeux.

Die Flosse an Hydropis Kopf dient als hochempfindliches
Radar. Damit kann es Bewegungen im Wasser und in der
Luft wahrnehmen. So wei es jederzeit, was in seiner
Umgebung passiert, ohne dabei seine Augen zu benutzen.

La aleta que tiene Mudkip en la cabeza acta de radar y es
muy sensible. Puede captar movimientos que se produzcan en
el agua y en el aire, y todo lo que ocurra a su alrededor, sin
necesidad de abrir los ojos.

La pinna sulla testa di Mudkip agisce come un radar
sensibilissimo. Usando questa pinna come sensore
in acqua e in aria, riesce a determinare cosa succede
attorno a lui senza bisogno di guardare.

The fin on Mudkips head acts as highly sensitive radar.
Using this fin to sense movements of water and air, this
Pokmon can determine what is taking place around it
without using its eyes.

Sous leau, Gobou peut respirer grce aux branchies sur
ses joues. Sil se retrouve en difficult pendant un combat,
ce Pokmon dchane ses pouvoirs incroyables. Il peut
dtruire des rochers plus gros que lui.

Im Wasser atmet Hydropi durch die Kiemen
an seinen Wangen. Wenn es im Kampf in eine
brenzlige Situation gert, setzt es seine
verblffende Kraft ein, mit der es Felsbrocken
zerquetschen kann, die grer sind als es selbst.

En el agua, Mudkip usa las branquias que tiene en los
mofletes para respirar. Cuando tiene que enfrentarse a una
situacin delicada en combate, desata una fuerza asombrosa
con la que puede destruir rocas incluso mayores que l.

In acqua Mudkip respira usando le branchie sulle mascelle.
In caso di situazioni critiche nella lotta scatena la sua forza
strabiliante, riuscendo a frantumare rocce pi grandi di lui.

In water, Mudkip breathes using the gills on its cheeks. If it is
faced with a tight situation in battle, this Pokmon will unleash
its amazing powerit can crush rocks bigger than itself.
